data.name: Bai Qu OST
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack album of Bai Qu contains 26 well-composed music with totally 70 minutes. All music works at the format of 320Kbps MP3 and FLAC. A PDF introduction booklet is attached with the album. Let the music lead you, once again immersed in the fantastic world of Bai Qu.

Tracklist

01. Opening: The Route to Freedom

02. Prelude: A River of Flowing Sand
03. An Afternoon with Jiayun
04. Agile Steps in Autumn Days (Remix)
05. Ayyám-i-Há (Piano Ver.)
06. An Image of Cloudy Afternoon
07. An Image of Affection
08. An Image of Rising Sun
09. An Image of Morning Bazaar
10. An Image of Anxiety
11. An Image of Perplexity
12. Loriots Can Hear the Wind Whispering (Concertina Ver.)
13. Mrs. Judge (Concertina Ver.)
14. Bijou Garden
15. If I Would Die in Dream
16. Bijou Garden (Piano Ver.)
17. White Flowers
18. Ale & Minnesingers & River
19. Composing Exercise on May 2, 2010
20. Star Festival
21. Loriots Can Hear the Wind Whispering
22. In a Flash
23. She Said
24. The Rain Is Approaching
25. Ayyám-i-Há
26. You Are the Starlight of July

* The booklet is all in Simplified Chinese.
